overview:
Evan Jones is CEO and founder of the 360desktop consumer media platform.

He has spent his working life, driving successful technology commercialization and start-ups, across Asia-Pacific, US and Europe - within markets that include manufacturing, enterprise software, 3D immersive photography, virtual tour software and a range of internet technologies.

Prior to 360desktop, as founder of IPIX in Australia and later, as co-founder and CEO of ChannelVR (www.360dof.com), he has driven the commercialization of the virtual tour software market both within Australia and internationally.

Evan sits on the board and advisory board of several emerging technology companies and holds an honors degree in Mechanical Engineering and an MBA, both from Australiaâ€™s Monash University.
